text: If we were characters in a movie, what genre would our relationship be?

options.text: A fast-paced action thriller 🎬🔥
A feel-good romantic comedy 😍😂
A deep and emotional drama 🎭💔
A quirky sci-fi adventure 🚀👽

text: Which of these fictional couples are we most like?

options.text: Chandler & Monica (Friends) – Playful but solid 🏠❤️
Jim & Pam (The Office) – Sweet and wholesome 🥰
Gomez & Morticia (The Addams Family) – Passionate and weird 🔥🖤
Han Solo & Princess Leia (Star Wars) – Fiery but loving ✨💫

text: If we had to survive in a post-apocalyptic world, what role would each of us play?

options.text: One of us leads, the other follows 🏹
We’d both try to outsmart everyone and take control 🎭
We’d chill in a safe house, avoiding trouble 🏠
We’d form a team and take on the world together ⚔️

text: If I suddenly turned into a cat for a day, what would you do?

options.text: Try to teach me tricks and see if I remember later 🐱🎩
Panic and call a vet 😱📞
Enjoy the peace and quiet for once 😌🐾
Carry me everywhere and show me off 😍🐈

text: If we started a band together, what would be our style?

options.text: A rock duo—loud, fun, and chaotic 🎸🔥
A jazz group—classy and smooth 🎷✨
A pop sensation—catchy and lovable 🎤💃
A folk duo—laid-back and soulful 🎻🌿

text: If one of us had a secret superpower, what would it most likely be?

options.text: Mind reading—because we always know what the other is thinking 🧠🔮
Time travel—to go back and relive our best moments ⏳❤️
Shape-shifting—to prank each other all the time 👻😆
Super strength—to carry all the groceries in one trip 💪🛍️

text: If we had a time machine, where would we go?

options.text: The future—to see how our lives turn out 🚀🔮
The past—to relive our best memories 🎞️💕
The dinosaur era—just for fun and chaos 🦖🔥
Nowhere—we’d probably break the timeline 😬

text: If we were competing on a reality show, what would we be best at?

options.text: A cooking competition—we make a great team in the kitchen 🍳🔥
An escape room challenge—we’d solve puzzles like pros 🏆🕵️‍♂️
A travel vlog competition—we’d be the coolest adventurers ✈️🌍
A prank war show—we’d outwit everyone 😈🎭

text: If we could swap lives for a day, what would be the most surprising thing?

options.text: How much nonsense I put up with daily 🙃
How good (or bad) my time management actually is ⏳
How much I overthink everything 🤯
How weird my daily routine actually is 😂

text: What’s the most likely reason we’d get kicked out of a fancy event?

options.text: Starting a dance-off in the middle of dinner 🕺💃
Sneaking into the kitchen to taste-test everything 🍽️🍰
Accidentally breaking something valuable 🙈💥
Laughing too loudly at inappropriate jokes 😂🤭
